alert.note: Alert for Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 2:14PM CDT until further notice by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Deep Fork River near Beggs affecting Okmulgee County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Deep Fork River near Beggs. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, severe agricultural flooding occurs. Some local roads are closed northwest of Okmulgee with some suburban homes northwest of Okmulgee sufffering minor flooding. Dentonville Road southwest of Beggs is closed. This will exceed the flooding which occurred on April 29, 1999 when the river crested at 27.10 feet. This is an extremely dangerous and life threatening situation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 27.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.9 feet tomorrow morning. The river will remain near this level through Saturday morning and then begin to fall Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
